results.title: country school diary_01
results.brief_description: An anonymous digital dairy created by a young person as part of a day long workshop run by ACMI. Each diary is scripted and a voiceover recorded by the individual young person. Some diaries use photographs brought in by the participant, but the primary visual content is often black and white, ‘stock’ footage of a poetic nature. At no point should the creator or school be positively identified when screening this work.

results.title: Country of Islam

results.title: Country line dancing
results.brief_description: Country Line Dancing, or Bootscooting, made easy for everyone. Instructor Diane Horner of “Cowboy” in Minneapolis Minnesota demonstrates the 40 basic dance steps used in line dancing. Dances demonstrated include Electric Slide, Country Strut, Southside Shuffle, Cowboy Cha Cha, Achy Breaky, Slap Leather, Tush Push and the circle dance, Cotton Eyed Joe, plus the special bonus, Sixteen Step. The first 30 minute part is followed by more complex instructions.

results.title: Country is my life

results.title: Country fairs
results.creator_credit: Jean Roy, Victor Jobin, Fernand Dansereau and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: For farm folk it is a day of judgment, for town folk a day of fun, in the Eastern Townships of Quebec. Drum majorettes and cattle shows, pipes and drums and homemade pickles - the country fair has something for everyone, and in this film the probing camera is everywhere to capture its essence to the full.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jean Roy, Victor Jobin, Fernand Dansereau and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Country doctor
results.creator_credit: Fred Moore, Leon Clore, British Information Services and Basic Films
results.brief_description: The daily activity of a doctor in general practice in a small English country town. In addition to his ceaseless duties among his patients, the country doctor is also a family man, with hobbies and interests outside his professional work and a keen participant in communal affairs. Some of the services available to the doctor and patient under the National Health Service are illustrated.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fred Moore, Leon Clore, British Information Services and Basic Films

results.title: Country Craft
results.brief_description: For many centuries much of India’s trade has been carried out by the country craft, the sailing vessels which carry produce along the 3,000 miles of India’s coastline. They carry the products of the interior and the south to the east of Calcutta, Rangoon, and Indonesia. They travel to the west to Bombay and Karachi, and across the Arabian Sea and the Indian Ocean, loaded with the coffee copra, coir, rope and textiles, the products of their ports of call.
